name: Towers VS. Cubes 0.3
description:
Controls:

- Click empty plots to build towers 

- Click walls & towers to upgrade them. 

- Click the blue cube to spend Exp.

Patch Notes: Enemies:

- Enemies are now much harder.

- Enemy speed is now capped.

- Enemies now glow.

Buildings:

- Made a few changes to the upgrading UI.

- The blue cube can now also be upgraded.

Changes:

- The game is now totally redesigned, giving progression after you lose.

- Exp is the new currency, which you gain after every game.

- Exp is used to upgrade the towers, walls and gold income.

- Leaderboard - The max number of cubes you killed in a single game.

- Username - You can set username in the Menu. You can also reset player data.

- Tutorial - A simple tutorial explaining everything you need to know.

- Menu - Redesigned Menu, displays player info, leaderboard, play buttons.

Other:

- Game speed can now be changed to x0.1, x1, x2 and x3 speed.

- As time progresses, it'll become darker and darker.

- The game will become harder faster once a certain amount of time pass.

- Tower projectiles now have a particle effect, which looks great in the dark.

- Towers can now do crits, which deals 10x the damage (red projectiles).

- A lot of small changes.
